title: 2025 German federal election - Wikipedia
snippet: Following a government crisis, Olaf Scholz dismissed FDP leader Christian Lindner from the incumbent government on 6 November 2024, triggering the collapse of the traffic light coalition and leaving the government without a majority. title: German election 2025 – DW
snippet: Friedrich Merz's center-right CDU, together with its CSU sister party, won Germany's 2025 parliamentary election. title: PM meeting with President Steinmeier of Germany: 3 December 2025 - GOV.UK
